main.name: Sakib Ashraf
main.description: I'm a Full Stack (PERN/MERN) Web Developer and My Web Development Stack is including HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JAVASCRIPT, REACTJS, NODEJS, EXPRESSJS, MONGODB, And POSTGRESQL. This is My Portfolio and Resume Site. And You are WELCOME here.
main.bio: I'm a Full Stack (PERN/MERN) Web Developer. My Web Development Stack is including HTML5, CSS3, BOOTSTRAP, JAVASCRIPT, REACTJS, NODEJS, EXPRESSJS, MONGODB, And POSTGRESQL. I'm Studying B.Sc in Physics at Chittagong College. Though I Know Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, And Adobe InDesign, I love Coding and Programming. Seeking An Entry-level Position To Begin My Career In a High-level Professional Environment. Also Secure a Responsible Career Opportunity & a Challenging Position In a Reputable Organization To Fully Utilize My Training And Skills To Expand My Learnings, Knowledge, And Skills. While Making a Significant Contribution To The Success Of The Company. My Strength Is My Positive Attitude. I'm an Optimistic Person. I Do Not Want To Lose Until I Really Defeated And I Always Hope For The Best. Because I Believe That By Only Holding Positivity In Our Hearts We Can Attract Positivity And Creativity.
main.contactmessage: Let's Have a Conversion About Everything.
